title: Nivea Men DEEP Active Clean Charcoal Body Wash, Cleansing Body Wash with Natural Charcoal, 3 Pack of 16.9 Fl Oz Bottles
description: Take care of your skin with NIVEA MEN DEEP Active Clean Charcoal Body Wash. This charcoal body wash for men is specially formulated to actively cleanse skin without drying it out. NIVEA MEN DEEP Active Clean Charcoal Body Wash is enriched with natural charcoal to draw out dirt and impurities like a magnet. This NIVEA MEN charcoal body wash thoroughly cleanses to leave skin feeling fresh, clean and revitalized. With the unique scent of vanilla and bourbon, this body wash helps prevent body odor and lasts long after the shower. It is also free of phthalates and microplastic particles. A cleansing body wash is a key part of a skin care routine and pairs well with NIVEA MEN DEEP Cleansing Beard and Face Wash. To use, rub this NIVEA body wash for men into a lather while gently massaging over body and rinse.
